attributes.action: Issue a referendum about election reform.
attributes.additional_details: To avoid the situation that we have now. Tactical voting, and now ending up with an unchallengable government who can essentially pass any law that that they want. This is unsafe in a supposed democracy. Any government in power would resist this as the current system worked for them.
attributes.background:
Discuss different options for election reform, and issue a referendum.  
On the referendum there should be a separate section giving options for voters to select the party they would choose if it was a proportional representation system in place.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700109
